text: (eyaṭa ovungē piyā) “mā ohuva oba samaga yavannēma næta. ehet oba siyallanvama (kisima vipatak) vaṭa kara gatahot misa, niyata vaśayenma ohuva mā veta gena ennehu yayi allāh mata oba (siyallanma) mā haṭa divrā nodunnahot misa” yayi pævasuvēya. ovun (esē) ohuṭa divrā dun vahāma, eyaṭa ohu “api kara gat mema givisumaṭa allāhma ārakṣakayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya” yayi (pævasīmen anaturuva, bunyāmīnva kæn̆davāgena yāmaṭa) anumætiya labā dunnēya
